verses.roman:
ebe ghara yāha, yabe āmi saba calimu
tabe tomā sabākāre saṅge lañā yāmu

synonyms: ebe—now; ghara yāha—go home; yabe—when; āmi—we; saba—all; calimu—will go; tabe—then; tomā sabākāre—all of you; saṅge—with; lañā—taking; yāmu—I shall go.
translation: "Now go home. When all of us go, I shall take all of you with me."
